title: 100+ Zero Investment Profitable Business and Free Marketing Ideas
description: Have you ever searched for business ideas on Google? Or "how to make money online"; "business ideas without investment"; "business ideas with low investment"; "easy business ideas"; "how to make money from home or from your smartphone" or "passive income stream" - this book is for you. You will get at least 1 workable idea that you can develop according to your locality and interest. This book is best for a self-driven stay-at-home parent, students, 9-5, and anyone looking for a risk-free business or additional income stream ideas and are committed action-takers to develop an idea into a side hustle. All businesses started as small, so don't worry about it.This book is full of zero-investment business ideas and prompts for anyone who is not tech-savvy, not time-rich, but smart enough to capitalize on the existing resources. Besides business ideas, there are 100+ marketing ideas that don't require any kind of investment or marketing budget from businesses that are just starting out. If you can access this book, have internet, laptop, or smartphone, you will certainly find something valuable. Do leave a kind and constructive review to encourage the author, and share/refer it to someone whom you think can benefit from it.
author: Zoya Naqvi
